title: Harry Styles Is All Kinds of Shirtless in ‘Lights Up’ Video
text:
If you’re a fan of shirtless Harry Styles, have I got a music video for you! Harry Styles’ new single, “Lights Up,” features the former 1D heartthrob—

shirtless and touched by ladies

bare chested and touched by fellas

on the back of a moped showing off some boy boob

sweaty and sans shirt

windswept without a shirt

having an out-of-body experience (body is shirtless, soul is in sequins)

There are shirted looks, to be sure, but most of the video features a semi-clothed and fully tortured Styles wondering if anyone knows who they are. All day, Styles has been promoting a website, DoYouKnowWhoYouAre.com, where fans enter their name to get a random compliment attached to their name. Each missive is signed “TPWK [Treat People With Kindness] LOVE, H.” Between the new single and the cryptic fan interaction, a new album seems in the offing for H.
description: Harry Styles dropped a music video for new single “Lights Up” at midnight October 11. The song is most likely a first single for a new album. A week after Niall Horan also dropped a single. Styles created a random compliment generator for fans.
